attributes.action: supermarkets to set up stands in nhs hospital grounds for staff & Ration basics
attributes.additional_details: Because our nhs workers are overworked, struggling and cannot access stores at opening times easily
attributes.background: Urgently set up mini stores in hospital grounds to allow exhausted nhs workers to easily access food.

rejection.details:
The location of supermarkets is a matter for their owners.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302823
